  • ARSENAL RATINGS AT BRENTFORD: GRANIT XHAKA AND FABIO VIEIRA ON SONG AS GUNNERS GO BACK TO TOP OF PREMIER...

  • DECONTROLLED VEHICLE DRIVERS ALLOWED TO USE CLASS D LICENCE, SAYS DR WEE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/18/decontrolled-vehicle-drivers-allowed-to-use-class-d-licence-says-dr-wee

    09/18/2022, 22:04

    68.42% Shortened!

    He, however, noted that decontrolled vehicles with unloaded weight exceeding 4,000kg must be operated by drivers with a valid Class E licence

    Dr Wee said around 96% of registered decontrolled vehicles have an unloaded weight of less than 3,500kg, which allows drivers to use a Class D licence

    However, there are a small number of vehicles, around 3% of decontrolled vehicles, with a gross vehicle weight of between 3,500kg and 4,000kg, he said

    The majority of the vehicles involved are models that have the same vehicle identification number or chassis, said Dr Wee

    However, following construction, design and materials used to build the space to transport goods, the unloaded weight limit has exceeded about 500kg of the unloaded weight limit of a motor car, he said

    This resulted in a small number of drivers having to obtain a Class E licence as the unloaded weight has exceeded the motor car category, even though the original model and chassis of the vehicle is the same as the original model vehicle whose unloaded weight is less than 3,500kg, said Dr Wee

    ['driver', 'decontrol', 'vehicle', 'unloaded', 'weight']

    He, however, noted that decontrolled vehicles with unloaded weight exceeding 4,000kg must be operated by drivers with a valid Class E licence

    Dr Wee said around 96% of registered decontrolled vehicles have an unloaded weight of less than 3,500kg, which allows drivers to use a Class D licence

    However, there are a small number of vehicles, around 3% of decontrolled vehicles, with a gross vehicle weight of between 3,500kg and 4,000kg, he said

    The majority of the vehicles involved are models that have the same vehicle identification number or chassis, said Dr Wee

    However, following construction, design and materials used to build the space to transport goods, the unloaded weight limit has exceeded about 500kg of the unloaded weight limit of a motor car, he said

    This resulted in a small number of drivers having to obtain a Class E licence as the unloaded weight has exceeded the motor car category, even though the original model and chassis of the vehicle is the same as the original model vehicle whose unloaded weight is less than 3,500kg, said Dr Wee

    ['driver', 'decontrol', 'vehicle', 'unloaded', 'weight']



  • SEVEN REPORTS LODGED AGAINST MOTIVATIONAL SPEAKER OVER SEXUAL ABUSE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/18/seven-reports-lodged-against-motivational-speaker-over-sexual-abuse

    09/18/2022, 22:04

    50.0% Shortened!

    Royal Malaysia Police secretary Deputy Comm Datuk Noorsiah Mohd Saaduddin said four investigation papers in Selangor and two investigation papers in Negri Sembilan have been referred to the deputy public prosecutor with the recommendation to prosecute under Section 14(a) of the Sexual Offence against Children Act 2017

    Previously, Selangor police chief Comm Datuk Arjunaidi Mohamed said that police reports were lodged against the speaker by four individuals, aged 17 and 18, and they claimed that they were victims of sexual abuse with the perpetrator being a known motivational speaker

    After getting to know them, the suspect would then sexually abuse the victims," he said

    The suspect was arrested on Sept 8 at the Selangor police headquarters and subsequently remanded.

    Report it to us

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['police', 'report', 'motivational', 'speaker', 'sexual']

    Previously, Selangor police chief Comm Datuk Arjunaidi Mohamed said that police reports were lodged against the speaker by four individuals, aged 17 and 18, and they claimed that they were victims of sexual abuse with the perpetrator being a known motivational speaker

    SHOYA NAKAJIMA'S first Antalyaspor appearance lasted just NINE seconds as he was red carded in "the worst debut ever"

    Shoya Nakajima makes his debut for Antalyaspor ✅On the pitch for no longer than 20 seconds before committing a late tackle..

    Antalyaspor's Soner Aydogdu was sent off after just eight minutes

    Former Montpellier star Younes Belhanda had already given the visitors the lead inside 60 seconds, with Norway international Fredrik Gulbrandsen making it two after Shoya's red card

  • PM’S HINT CLEARLY SHOWS GE15 WILL BE HELD THIS YEAR, SAYS AHMAD MASLAN

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/18/pms-hint-clearly-shows-ge15-will-be-held-this-year-says-ahmad-maslan/28842

    09/18/2022, 20:04

    45.45% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise PONTIAN, Sept 18 — Umno secretary-general Datuk Seri Ahmad Maslan said he is confident that the 15th general election would be held this year which has three months to go

    In short there is nothing else left to do

    Ahmad said he wanted the party machinery to respond to the call of Umno’s top leadership that the party must dominate the virtual campaign and cyber war, as a lesson learned from GE14 when it was defeated due to online allegations and slander

    Ahmad said all preparations have been completed and what’s left is to update the machinery and portfolios at the polling district centres (PDM)

    “(We) are in the process of (receiving the list of candidates)

    “(Usually) when Parliament dissolves, we have about two to three weeks for everything to be finalised (list of candidates)

    ['ahmad', 'say', 'held', 'three', 'ge15']

    A woman makes her way through the strong wind and rain in Miyazaki, southern Japan, Sunday, Sept

    18, 2022, as a powerful typhoon pounded southern Japan

    Please move to safety while it's still light outside." The JMA has warned the region could face "unprecedented" danger from high winds, storm surges and torrential rain and called the storm "very dangerous." "Areas affected by the storm are seeing the sort of rain that has never been experienced before," Hiro Kato, the head of the Weather Monitoring and Warning Centre, told reporters Sunday

    "The wind has become extremely strong

    Rain is falling hard too," he told AFP

  • MAGNITUDE 6.8 QUAKE HITS TAIWAN, TSUNAMI WARNINGS LIFTED

    https://www.malaysiakini.com/news/636176

    09/18/2022, 19:02

    57.14% Shortened!

    A 6.8 magnitude earthquake hit the sparsely populated southeastern part of Taiwan today, the island's weather bureau said, derailing train carriages, causing a convenience store to collapse, and trapping hundreds on mountain roads

    Taiwan's fire department said all four people were rescued from a building housing a convenience store that collapsed in Yuli, while three people whose vehicle fell off a damaged bridge were rescued and taken to hospital

    The Taiwan Railways Administration said six carriages came off the rails at Dongli station in eastern Taiwan after part of the platform canopy collapsed, but the fire department said there were no injuries

    The quake could be felt across Taiwan, the weather bureau said

    Taiwan lies near the junction of two tectonic plates and is prone to earthquakes

    More than 100 people were killed in a quake in southern Taiwan in 2016, while a 7.3 magnitude quake killed more than 2,000 people in 1999

    ['magnitude', 'taiwan', 'weather', 'say', 'quake']

    A 6.8 magnitude earthquake hit the sparsely populated southeastern part of Taiwan today, the island's weather bureau said, derailing train carriages, causing a convenience store to collapse, and trapping hundreds on mountain roads

    Taiwan's fire department said all four people were rescued from a building housing a convenience store that collapsed in Yuli, while three people whose vehicle fell off a damaged bridge were rescued and taken to hospital

    The Taiwan Railways Administration said six carriages came off the rails at Dongli station in eastern Taiwan after part of the platform canopy collapsed, but the fire department said there were no injuries

    The quake could be felt across Taiwan, the weather bureau said

    Taiwan lies near the junction of two tectonic plates and is prone to earthquakes

    More than 100 people were killed in a quake in southern Taiwan in 2016, while a 7.3 magnitude quake killed more than 2,000 people in 1999

    ['magnitude', 'taiwan', 'weather', 'say', 'quake']

  • ABUSED CHILDREN RESCUED FROM CONDO IN STABLE CONDITION, SAYS RINA HARUN

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/18/abused-children-rescued-from-condo-in-stable-condition-says-rina-harun

    09/18/2022, 18:04

    68.42% Shortened!

    Rina also said there was an urgent need for child protection officers to handle cases related to child abuse and neglect

    She said this was because of the current ratio for one child protection officer who has to manage 50 to 100 cases of child abuse and neglect cases

    She added that the number exceeded the ideal ratio of a child protection officer who should only be managing 30 to 35 such cases

    "The Public Service Department has approved 1,122 posts in 2020 for recruitment over a five-year period with an average of 250 recruitments every year starting 2021 and 224 recruitments this year

    "Now there are only 474 child protection officers in the whole country and this number is certainly not enough to monitor and manage matters related to the welfare of victims of abuse and neglect

    "These child protection officers have to examine the latest situation, provide temporary placement, monitor the situation before making recommendations to the court for each case of child abuse and neglect

    ['child', 'abuse', 'say', 'protection', 'officer']

    Rina also said there was an urgent need for child protection officers to handle cases related to child abuse and neglect

    She said this was because of the current ratio for one child protection officer who has to manage 50 to 100 cases of child abuse and neglect cases

    She added that the number exceeded the ideal ratio of a child protection officer who should only be managing 30 to 35 such cases

    "The Public Service Department has approved 1,122 posts in 2020 for recruitment over a five-year period with an average of 250 recruitments every year starting 2021 and 224 recruitments this year

    "Now there are only 474 child protection officers in the whole country and this number is certainly not enough to monitor and manage matters related to the welfare of victims of abuse and neglect

    "These child protection officers have to examine the latest situation, provide temporary placement, monitor the situation before making recommendations to the court for each case of child abuse and neglect

    ['child', 'abuse', 'say', 'protection', 'officer']

    On Sept 7, the suspect was arrested and remanded for seven days

    The suspect was handed over to Shah Alam police on Monday (Sept 12) to assist investigation pertaining to another of the victim's report before the case was referred to the North Klang police

    Earlier, a nine-second video went viral on Facebook showing a man being hit by another man wearing a black shirt and jeans in the middle of the road.

  • POWERFUL EARTHQUAKE HITS SOUTHEAST TAIWAN, TSUNAMI WARNING ISSUED

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2022/09/18/powerful-earthquake-hits-southeast-taiwan-tsunami-warning-issued

    09/18/2022, 16:02

    50.0% Shortened!

    Sunday, 18 Sep 2022

    Taiwan media said a low rise building housing a convenience store collapsed, while at least one train carriage was de-railed at a station on the east coast

    Tsunami Warning Center issued a warning in Taiwan after the tremor

    It said hazardous tsunami waves were possible within 300 km (190 miles) of the epicentre along the coasts of Taiwan

    Japan’s weather agency issued a warning for tsunami waves of 1 metre for part of Okinawa prefecture following the earthquake

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

  • AS PKR LAUNCHES POLLS MACHINERY APP, RAFIZI SAYS WINNING 30PC OF MALAY VOTE ‘DOABLE’

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/18/as-pkr-launches-polls-machinery-app-rafizi-says-winning-30pc-of-malay-vote-doable/28784

    09/18/2022, 15:05

    71.43% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 18 — PKR deputy president Rafizi Ramli said today Pakatan Harapan’s (PH) chances of getting the 30 per cent Malay vote needed to put the coalition back in power at the 15th general election is “doable”, as the party begins to ramp up its machinery for the looming national polls

    Rafizi claimed the shift in Malay voter sentiment had already happened between July and August, but on a smaller scale

    Between July and August, there was a 3 to 4 per cent swing in Malay votes towards Pakatan,” said the PKR deputy president

    If you see this trend of 1 to 2 per cent swing every month towards Pakatan and PKR, even if there is a one-on-one fight, if Pakatan can get up to 30 per cent of the Malay vote and voter turnout is 75 per cent, PH strategists believe its maiden national win in the watershed 2018 general election was made possible by a 30 per cent Malay vote swing

    “Eighty per cent of the respondents said they are very dissatisfied with the state of the economy,” he said

    That way canvassing would be far cheaper since campaign workers can filter out voters that aren’t likely to vote for Pakatan and focus only on those who might, Rafizi asserted, ultimately reducing dependency on funding

    ['rafizi', 'per', 'cent', 'malay', 'vote']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 18 — PKR deputy president Rafizi Ramli said today Pakatan Harapan’s (PH) chances of getting the 30 per cent Malay vote needed to put the coalition back in power at the 15th general election is “doable”, as the party begins to ramp up its machinery for the looming national polls

    Rafizi claimed the shift in Malay voter sentiment had already happened between July and August, but on a smaller scale

    Between July and August, there was a 3 to 4 per cent swing in Malay votes towards Pakatan,” said the PKR deputy president

    If you see this trend of 1 to 2 per cent swing every month towards Pakatan and PKR, even if there is a one-on-one fight, if Pakatan can get up to 30 per cent of the Malay vote and voter turnout is 75 per cent, PH strategists believe its maiden national win in the watershed 2018 general election was made possible by a 30 per cent Malay vote swing

    “Eighty per cent of the respondents said they are very dissatisfied with the state of the economy,” he said

    That way canvassing would be far cheaper since campaign workers can filter out voters that aren’t likely to vote for Pakatan and focus only on those who might, Rafizi asserted, ultimately reducing dependency on funding

    ['rafizi', 'per', 'cent', 'malay', 'vote']



  • 'WORKS BOTH WAYS' - ARTHUR DECISION EXPLAINED FOLLOWING FIRST LIVERPOOL START

    https://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/arthur-melo-liverpool-first-start-25046397

    09/18/2022, 15:02

    50.0% Shortened!

    Arthur made his first Liverpool start during Liverpool U21s' 1-0 victory over Leicester City in the Premier League 2 Follow the latest transfer news and more with our LFC newsletter We have more newsletters Barry Lewtas has hailed the professionalism new signing Arthur Melo brought to Liverpool's U21s squad after the midfielder was handed his first start for the club during the 1-0 victory over Leicester City

    With Klopp void of short-term options, he sanctioned a season-long loan for Arthur

    “They’re top-level professionals," Lewtas told Liverpoolfc.com, following the 1-0 victory

    “That’s obviously what sometimes this group can do

    With the former Bournemouth loanee not featuring since the 1-1 draw with Crystal Palace at Anfield last month, and Carvalho working his way back from injury, it was a perfect opportunity to add experience to the new intake of players, according to Lewtas

    “It gives players an opportunity if they need minutes to come in and play some minutes and play in the way we play," added Lewtas

    ['arthur', 'first', 'liverpool', 'start', 'victory']

    Arthur made his first Liverpool start during Liverpool U21s' 1-0 victory over Leicester City in the Premier League 2 Follow the latest transfer news and more with our LFC newsletter We have more newsletters Barry Lewtas has hailed the professionalism new signing Arthur Melo brought to Liverpool's U21s squad after the midfielder was handed his first start for the club during the 1-0 victory over Leicester City

    With Klopp void of short-term options, he sanctioned a season-long loan for Arthur

    09/18/2022, 13:04

    68.42% Shortened!

    Narathiwat police chief General Wan Seman Wan Salleh said the police also distributed the pictures of a suspect believed to be involved in the kidnapping

    "We are now carrying out a massive operation to help the Malaysian police locate a 36-year-old cosmetics agent who was kidnapped from her home in Kampung Semat Jal, Tumpat on Sept 13

    "The operation was activated as soon as the Thai police received the photographs of a woman and a suspect wanted in connection with the case,” he added

    Wan Seman said the operation to locate the victim was carried out immediately due to good relations with the Kelantan police and cross-border cooperation over the years

    "The Thai police have also informed the four police stations adjacent to Kelantan in Golok, Waeng, Takbai and Buketa about the abduction case so that efforts will be redoubled

    Wan Seman Wan Salleh

    ['thai', 'police', 'woman', 'kidnap', 'tumpat']

    09/18/2022, 11:04

    73.91% Shortened!

    In the first accident, a 41-year-old pedestrian died after he was hit by a vehicle at around 1.20am, near a restaurant in Sinsuran, Kota Kinabalu

    A pedestrian was killed in Kota Kinabalu

    The victim was pronounced dead by medical officials at the scene, ACP Zaidi added

    He said the victim was believed to have tried crossing the road when he was hit by a vehicle

    The victim, identified as Mohd Ridwan Baharuddin, was believed to have lost control of his vehicle before skidding off the road and crashing into a road divider

    The vehicle somehow crashed past the road divider and the victim was pinned inside his heavily damaged car following the accident

    ['kota', 'kinabalu', 'accident', 'vehicle', 'say']

    09/18/2022, 10:05

    62.5% Shortened!

    Sunday, 18 Sep 2022

    Personnel of the Fire and Rescue Department and the Johor Forestry Department are also participating in the operation

    Meanwhile, Johor Forestry Department director Datuk Salim Aman said that the department will be taking action against those who entered the forest reserve under Section 47 of the National Forestry Act 1984 (Act 313) for entering the forest reserve without a permit

    “The search and rescue operation will be continued at 8.30am,” he said, adding that it is important that those who wish to go for a hike make their intentions known so that it would not create a problem for the authorities in case of an emergency

    Those with no experience in the forest are forbidden to go for a hike alone,” he said

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

  • CAR RENTAL COMPANIES ENJOYING BUSINESS BOOM

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/18/car-rental-companies-enjoying-business-boom

    09/18/2022, 09:04

    75.0% Shortened!

    “I have about 30 vehicles for rent, but they are no longer enough to cater to the existing demand

    “There is a shortage of vehicles across the board as we have a network of agents who will ‘lend’ vehicles to car rental providers in need

    “The demand is high even on weekdays as tourists usually come in for a day trip to avoid the weekend traffic jam on the Causeway,” said Mohamed Faliq Farhan, who has been running a car rental service for the past seven years

    Mohamed Faliq Farhan, 35, said that smaller cars like the Perodua Axia and the Myvi are popular with customers because the rental cost is only between RM120 and RM200 a day, depending on the car’s features

    A chartered car service owner, who only wanted to be known as Lim, said his business has steadily recovered by about 60% to 70%

    He returned to offer car rental services when the Malaysia-Singapore border reopened

    ['car', 'rental', 'say', 'service', 'vehicle']

    “I have about 30 vehicles for rent, but they are no longer enough to cater to the existing demand

    He returned to offer car rental services when the Malaysia-Singapore border reopened

    ['car', 'rental', 'say', 'service', 'vehicle']



  • EXPERTS: VAPERS CAN DEVELOP LUNG INJURY

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/18/experts-vapers-can-develop-evali

    09/18/2022, 09:04

    80.0% Shortened!

    In severe cases, health experts also warn that Evali could lead to respiratory failure and, worse, the grim possibility of death

    Ikram Health Malaysia president Dr Mohd Afiq Mohd Nor said Evali was an acute lung injury that has the potential to cause death

    “The keyword, however, is to never start vaping or smoking,” he said

    Universiti Kebangsaan Malaysia public health expert Prof Dr Sharifa Ezat Wan Puteh said the possibility for vapers to develop Evali was high, as the vape industry in Malaysia was yet to be regulated

    She also cited the Evali outbreak in the US, adding that it resulted from the consumption of harmful products that were contained in vape juices

    “In Malaysia, using vape to quit smoking could be done on a case-by-case basis after other nicotine replacement therapy measures have proven to be futile,” Dr Sharifa said.

    ['could', 'lung', 'say', 'symptom', 'vaping']

    In severe cases, health experts also warn that Evali could lead to respiratory failure and, worse, the grim possibility of death

    Ikram Health Malaysia president Dr Mohd Afiq Mohd Nor said Evali was an acute lung injury that has the potential to cause death

    “The keyword, however, is to never start vaping or smoking,” he said

    Universiti Kebangsaan Malaysia public health expert Prof Dr Sharifa Ezat Wan Puteh said the possibility for vapers to develop Evali was high, as the vape industry in Malaysia was yet to be regulated

    She also cited the Evali outbreak in the US, adding that it resulted from the consumption of harmful products that were contained in vape juices

    “In Malaysia, using vape to quit smoking could be done on a case-by-case basis after other nicotine replacement therapy measures have proven to be futile,” Dr Sharifa said.

    ['could', 'lung', 'say', 'symptom', 'vaping']

    On Friday, firefighters and members of the public rescued a boy who was trying to run away from suspected abusers on the fourth floor of the condominium

    09/18/2022, 09:04

    77.78% Shortened!

    So, it is best to wear a mask,” he added

    “We do not make it compulsory for customers to wear masks but from what we have noticed, the majority still do so,” he said

    Ong said the number of customers who no longer wear their masks is small

    “So, it is best that we use our mask,” he said, adding that the workers are provided with masks while some prefer to wear their own

    Mee goreng stall operator Mahboob Mohd Zakaria would put on a mask to ease any concern that his customers might have, although he personally prefers not to wear one

    “Some customers feel uncomfortable and ask me about it when I remove my mask

  • PROTESTS BREAK OUT AT FUNERAL OF IRANIAN WOMAN WHO DIED AFTER MORALS ARREST

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/world/2022/09/18/protests-break-out-at-funeral-of-iranian-woman-who-died-after-morals-arrest/28750

    09/18/2022, 09:02

    76.0% Shortened!

    Police were seen firing tear gas and one man was shown on a video with an injury to the head that someone could be heard saying was caused by birdshot

    Marchers were seen confronting riot police amid the sound of sporadic gunfire

    Police said Amini became ill as she waited with other detained women at a morality police station, rejecting allegations on social media that she was likely beaten

    Reuters could not authenticate the video, which appeared to have been edited

    Police earlier said Amini had suffered a heart attack after being taken to the station to be "educated"

    Prominent sports and arts figures posted critical social media comments about Amini's death and protests were held in a Tehran on Friday amid a heavy presence of riot police

    ['protest', 'woman', 'police', 'video', 'post']

    Police were seen firing tear gas and one man was shown on a video with an injury to the head that someone could be heard saying was caused by birdshot

    Marchers were seen confronting riot police amid the sound of sporadic gunfire

    Police said Amini became ill as she waited with other detained women at a morality police station, rejecting allegations on social media that she was likely beaten

  • BE PREPARED FOR FLOODS IN THE NEXT SIX MONTHS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/focus/2022/09/18/be-prepared-for-floods-in-the-next-six-months

    09/18/2022, 08:04

    82.86% Shortened!

    The recent devastating flood in greater Kuala Lumpur and the Klang Valley is an example of a disaster most likely due to climate change and anthropogenic activities of development

    The National Disaster Management Agency under the Prime Minister’s Department and its partner institutions have so far conducted around 155 such programmes involving about 12,600 participants from among community leaders, young people, village committees and NGOs; these people will be the first responders at local levels during a flood event

    Effective decision-making by local governments should be supported by reliable data and information from multi-stakeholder groups for better flood risk preparedness and management

    This decision-making model for local government is in line with the aspirations of the 12th Malaysia Plan (2021-2025) as well as programmes such as the National Water Sector Transformation 2040, Voluntary Local Reporting, Voluntary National Reporting, and district disaster management committees chaired by the District Officer

    All this is part of a bigger framework involving the National Disaster Management Agency at the federal level, and the state disaster management committees at state level

    This supports the aspirations of the Sendai Framework on Disaster Risk Reduction

    ['flood', 'malaysia', 'government', 'disaster', 'management']

    The recent devastating flood in greater Kuala Lumpur and the Klang Valley is an example of a disaster most likely due to climate change and anthropogenic activities of development

    The National Disaster Management Agency under the Prime Minister’s Department and its partner institutions have so far conducted around 155 such programmes involving about 12,600 participants from among community leaders, young people, village committees and NGOs; these people will be the first responders at local levels during a flood event

    Effective decision-making by local governments should be supported by reliable data and information from multi-stakeholder groups for better flood risk preparedness and management

    This decision-making model for local government is in line with the aspirations of the 12th Malaysia Plan (2021-2025) as well as programmes such as the National Water Sector Transformation 2040, Voluntary Local Reporting, Voluntary National Reporting, and district disaster management committees chaired by the District Officer

    All this is part of a bigger framework involving the National Disaster Management Agency at the federal level, and the state disaster management committees at state level

    This supports the aspirations of the Sendai Framework on Disaster Risk Reduction

    ['flood', 'malaysia', 'government', 'disaster', 'management']

    “The mandate to set the date for the 15th General Election is with the Prime Minister, the president and deputy president of Umno, so we trust them to decide

    “But even if the Prime Minister were to dissolve Parliament tomorrow, the machinery is ready,” he added

  • HOW ARSENAL AND MIKEL ARTETA MANAGED TO FORGET THAT CHASTENING NIGHT AT BRENTFORD 13 MONTHS AGO

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11219401/How-Arsenal-Mikel-Arteta-managed-forget-chastening-night-Brentford-13-months-ago.html

    09/18/2022, 08:03

    88.24% Shortened!

    'Arsenal fans will go away from here tonight thinking "we've been bullied"', was Gary Neville's assessment of Arsenal's 2-0 defeat to Brentford on the opening night of the 2021-22 campaign.  Mikel Arteta's side travelled to Thomas Frank's then-newly promoted Brentford team and were taught a comprehensive lesson of preparation and application.  Arsenal return to Brentford 13 months on from their chastening defeat at the same ground One game into the new season, knives, in some quarters, were already out for the Spaniard and two subsequent defeats at an aggregate score of 7-0 did not do much to stem the tide.  Following that dreadful start that left Arsenal at the foot of the league table questioning where their next win could come from, they have improved markedly.  It was only a late season blip that saw them miss out on the Champions League after putting themselves in the box seat with weeks of the season to go with Arteta's young side emerging from the canvass of their poor start to challenge towards the upper echelons of the league.  Not many, had you asked them on August 13 2021, would have given Arsenal much of a chance of sitting pretty at the top of the league a year later

    It is unlikely to have been much different had Alexandre Lacazette and Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, both missing through Covid that evening, been fit.  Arsenal looked a team adrift in their 2-0 defeat in west London at the start of last season A glimpse at the bench offers a further change of the rigorous nature of Arteta and Edu's squad rebuild over the last year

    The changing faces in Sunday's starting XI to the mismatched side that Arteta was forced to put out last year reflects a club on the up rather than the downward spiral they appeared to be descending on last year.  Style of play The early Arteta reign was somewhat characterised by an uncertainty of what he wanted his Arsenal team to be

    When he arrived from City, many expected them to start playing like a Guardiola side

    The Swiss was booed off in October 2019 and swore at the Arsenal fans

    People at Arsenal began to identify with the youthful team that they saw in front of them

    ['team', 'brentford', 'arsenal', 'arteta', 'side']

    Barcelona's task against the league's bottom side was made easier when Elche centre-back Gonzalo Verdu was sent off in the 14th minute for pulling Lewandowski's shirt as the striker was about to reach the area

    Memphis scored a magnificent goal to double Barcelona's lead in the 41st minute while Lewandowski grabbed his second early in the second half, pouncing inside the area after Memphis had fought hard to win back the ball

    09/18/2022, 06:03

    70.0% Shortened!

    Jurgen Klopp will have been delighted to see Fabio Carvalho and Arthur Melo complete 90 minutes for Liverpool's under-21 side against Leicester City on Saturday afternoon Liverpool’s problems in central midfield look set to ease following the international break after Arthur Melo and Fabio Carvalho got vital minutes under their belts

    Liverpool under-21s’ Premier League 2 fixture against Leicester City contained some familiar faces, with Arthur, Carvalho and Nat Phillips all involved

    Arthur played in a midfield three alongside Jake Cain and Stefan Bajcetic, while Carvalho operated further forward in his more unusual position with Stewart and Bobby Clark

    "Arthur needs now just football – and training, especially, that's how it is," Klopp said earlier this month

    "He wasn't in team training for a while at Juve, so he needs proper team training – and that's what we are doing with him

    "It's not like in the Champions League you have to work less than in the Premier League

    ['klopp', 'carvalho', 'arthur', 'minute', 'liverpool']

  • OPPORTUNITY BECKONS FOR TZE YONG TO WIN FIRST WORLD TOUR TITLE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/sport/badminton/2022/09/18/opportunity-beckons-for-tze-yong-to-win-first-world-tour-title

    09/18/2022, 06:02

    68.42% Shortened!

    NATIONAL men’s singles shuttler Ng Tze Yong (pic) has a good opportunity to capture his first World Tour title in the Indonesian Masters from Oct 18-23 in Malang

    39 Tze Yong is the top seed in the tournament and will be looking to go all the way and win despite its lower-tier status

    “We switched Tze Yong to the Indonesian Masters as the chances players withdrawing from the Denmark Open looked slim,” said singles coaching director Wong Choong Hann

    Tze Yong’s last World Tour event was the Singapore Open in July where he reached the last eight

    Tze Yong’s best result in a World Tour event so far was reaching the semi-final of the Indian Open in January where he went down to home favourite Lakshya Sen 21-19, 16-21, 12-21

    For now, the Johor-born Tze Yong is aiming to capture his first gold medal at the Malaysia Games (Sukma)

  • ISTANA NEGARA, ICONIC BUILDINGS AROUND KL LIGHT UP IN ORANGE FOR SOLIDARITY

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/17/istana-negara-iconic-buildings-around-kl-light-up-in-orange-for-solidarity

    09/17/2022, 23:04

    68.42% Shortened!

    A Bernama check found that iconic monuments in several locations in the capital city including the Kuala Lumpur Tower began to glow in orange light as early as 7.30pm and it was clearly visible from Istana Negara

    "The colour orange was chosen as the official colour for World Patient Safety Day, as well as a symbol of Universal Health Coverage

    Last Monday, Health director-general Tan Sri Dr Noor Hisham Abdullah, in a post on his Facebook said three iconic locations, namely KLCC Lake Symphony Fountain, Kuala Lumpur Tower and Kuala Lumpur City Hall (DBKL), would be lit up in orange

    In addition, Hospital Kuala Lumpur (HKL), Cheras Rehabilitation Hospital, Tuanku Muhriz Chancellor's Hospital UKM, University of Malaya Medical Centre, Tuanku Mizan Armed Forces Hospital and Institute of Respiratory Medicine also participated in the orange solidarity

    World Patient Safety Day is celebrated on Sept 17 every year to call for global unity and concerted action by all parties to improve patient safety and recognise it as a global health priority

    World Patient Safety Day 2022

    ['kuala', 'lumpur', 'orange', 'istana', 'negara']

    - Brentford made all four substitutions by the 76th minute, with Arsenal not doing one until the 78th

    - This was Arsenal's 6th shutout win by a 3+ goal difference since 2020-21

    Azahar also suggested that every interpreter improve their knowledge in the field of information technology to ensure that the online proceedings for court cases run smoothly

    "Therefore, every interpreter plays an important role to ensure that online proceedings can be handled smoothly and in an orderly manner," he added

  • BIKERS BERATE DRIVER WHO STOPPED ON EMERGENCY LANE AFTER PREGNANT WIFE SUFFERS NAUSEA

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/17/bikers-berate-driver-who-stopped-on-emergency-lane-after-pregnant-wife-suffers-nausea

    09/17/2022, 21:04

    53.85% Shortened!

    Muallim OCPD Supt Mohd Hasni Mohd Nasir said the incident happened around noon on Friday (Sept 16) at KM370 of the NSE

    He said the SUV was heading towards Ipoh from Kuala Lumpur when the driver's 34-year-old wife became nauseous due to her pregnancy

    "When she was done vomiting, the driver started driving along the emergency lane when an MPV suddenly entered the emergency lane, and the SUV driver reacted and slammed on the brakes," he said

    He said a motorcycle behind the SUV managed to brake in time but two other motorcycles further behind did not, causing a pile-up

    "The three motorcyclists sustained minor injuries and as they were furious at the SUV driver, started to scold him," he added

    Supt Mohd Hasni urged the people to stop circulating a video of the incident

    ['driver', 'suv', 'emergency', 'lane', 'nse']

  • MAT SABU: PAKATAN HARAPAN, AMANAH WILL FACE A TOUGH BATTLE DURING GE15

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/17/mat-sabu-pakatan-harapan-amanah-will-face-a-tough-battle-during-ge15/28675

    09/17/2022, 16:04

    53.85% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise SEREMBAN, Sept 17 ― Pakatan Harapan (PH) and Parti Amanah Negara (Amanah) will be facing an uphill task to overcome the challenges in store during the coming 15th general election (GE15)

    Amanah president Mohamad Sabu or popularly known as Mat Sabu, acknowledged that PH was embroiled in various internal issues within the party ever since the party elections was held recently

    “It will not be good to disrupt the process and progress of the party, especially when the party leadership is preparing to face a challenging general election,” he told reporters here today after opening the Amanah National Convention 2022 which is themed Amanah For Malaysia

    He said factors like location, constitution to be contested and capability of candidates (winning candidates) would be considered during the discussion to ensure victory for Amanah

    “The actual number cannot be determined now but would certainly be more than the GE14

    More than 800 delegates from all over the country are attending the Amanah Convention which is scheduled to end tomorrow

    ['amanah', 'election', 'ge15', 'sabu', 'party']

    I sincerely apologise over the matter and I have also told my driver to apologise to the public," he said

    Ling said he was headed to an event in Batu Pahat and seated in the back of the car

    "My driver has been called by the police to give his statement and has also received a summons," he said

    "Further checks found that the car belongs to the Johor state secretary for the use of the Yong Peng assemblyman

    The driver of the car had his statement recorded on Friday (Sept 16) and a summons was issued," he said in a statement.

    On Thursday during his meeting with Xi in Uzbekistan, Putin said he understood China had “questions and concerns” about Moscow’s position, an indirect acknowledgement of Beijing’s potential disquiet

    It is somewhat curious that President Putin would be the one to admit it and to admit it so openly,” Price added, referring to China’s official name, the People’s Republic of China

    The fee to make or renew a passport – valid for five years – is RM200

    He said the Malaysian passport, the 12th most powerful in the world, is a high-security item

    To dispose of the documents, Immigration authorities would have to apply to the National Archives

    “Most of them gave the reason of not having the time to pick up their passport or that they are not aware it was ready for collection

    Khairul Dzaimee said those whose uncollected passports had been disposed of would have to reapply

  • MAN DROWNS IN BID TO SAVE HIS CAR FROM WATERY GRAVE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/17/man-drowns-in-bid-to-save-his-car-from-watery-grave

    09/17/2022, 08:04

    64.71% Shortened!

    Manjung OCPD Asst Comm Nor Omar Sappi said the victim from Seri Manjung had parked his car near a slope that was facing the beach, but had not turned off the engine

    “Both had got out of the car and suddenly, the friend heard the victim’s shout for help as the car slid down towards the beach

    “The victim was in front of the car and was trying to stop it from moving

    “The friend rushed to help him before the victim fell under the car that had been partly submerged

    “Together with several passers-by, the friend pulled out the victim from under the car within 20 minutes,” he said in a statement yesterday

    ACP Nor Omar said an assistant medical officer from the Seri Manjung Hospital confirmed that the victim had died

    ['car', 'beach', 'manjung', 'say', 'victim']

    “Both had got out of the car and suddenly, the friend heard the victim’s shout for help as the car slid down towards the beach

    “The victim was in front of the car and was trying to stop it from moving

    “The friend rushed to help him before the victim fell under the car that had been partly submerged

    “Together with several passers-by, the friend pulled out the victim from under the car within 20 minutes,” he said in a statement yesterday

    ACP Nor Omar said an assistant medical officer from the Seri Manjung Hospital confirmed that the victim had died

    ['car', 'beach', 'manjung', 'say', 'victim']



  • IN ITALY FLOODS, MUD TSUNAMI SWALLOWED VICTIMS ALIVE

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/world/2022/09/17/in-italy-floods-mud-tsunami-swallowed-victims-alive/28623

    09/17/2022, 08:02

    72.73% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise OSTRA (Italy), Sept 17 — Adriana Pianelli called out to her husband and son as they disappeared under a sea of mud in the underground carpark, during a deadly storm that devastated villages in central Italy

    “I saw them, I called Andrea! Giuseppe! But the water had risen so fast, and was so thick with mud, they had no chance,” she said, the arms of her pink jumper pulled down over clenched fists

    Andrea, 25, had been nearly out of the garage when he turned back to help his father, 65-year old Giuseppe, who had slipped over

    “It was like a tsunami

    “I didn’t have much

    Laura Marinelli, 33, grabbed her 18-month-old daughter and ran to neighbours upstairs as her ground-floor home near Ostra began to flood

    ['ostra', 'son', 'mud', 'water', 'say']

    09/17/2022, 08:02

    88.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise LONDON, Sept 17 — King Charles III and his three siblings stood guard around their mother Queen Elizabeth II’s coffin yesterday in solemn vigil honouring Britain’s longest-serving monarch

    King Charles and his siblings mounted a similar vigil at St Giles’ Cathedral in Edinburgh before the coffin was flown to London

    The Vigil of the Princes first took place in Westminster Hall in 1936 for king George V

    His four sons, including Queen Elizabeth’s father, stood guard

    Prince William and his brother Prince Harry will lead the queen’s grandchildren in a similar vigil on Saturday evening

    Sharon Driscoll was in floods of tears after meeting King Charles at Cardiff Castle

    ['king', 'charles', 'queen', 'prince', 'queue']

    The record for race victories in a single season stands at 13, held jointly by seven-time champion Michael Schumacher and four-time title-holder Sebastian Vettel.

    Verstappen looks likely to set a new mark, albeit in a 22-race campaign

    Schumacher achieved his feat in an 18-race season in 2004, and Vettel over 19 races in 2013.

    He doesn't look anyone in the face, and in this, he reminds me a lot of Michael."

    "Elsewhere, it's the drivers that count, just look at the Verstappen effect

  • AGENTS BRINGING IN ROHINGYAS ALSO HELPED OBTAIN UNHCR CARDS, SAYS IMMIGRATION DG

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/17/agents-bringing-in-rohingyas-also-helped-obtain-unhcr-cards-says-immigration-dg

    09/17/2022

    62.5% Shortened!

    Saturday, 17 Sep 2022

    Immigration director-general Datuk Seri Khairul Dzaimee Daud said the matter would be scrutinised by a committee at the Home Ministry for further action

    "I had the chance to speak to some Rohingya UNHCR card holders (in the operation) yesterday

    "They also confessed that the agents managed trips to the UNHCR office in Kuala Lumpur for the process of obtaining the card

    "They (ethnic Rohingya) did not purchase the (UNHCR) cards, but they paid the agent between RM5,000 and RM7,000 per person, and the agent would take them to the UNHCR office

    Khairul Dzaimee said those arrested in the operation that started at 11.15pm consisted of 10 Bangladeshi men, eight Indonesian men, five Myanmar men and one Nepalese man and woman

    ['immigration', 'agent', 'would', 'unhcr', 'card']

    Saturday, 17 Sep 2022

    Immigration director-general Datuk Seri Khairul Dzaimee Daud said the matter would be scrutinised by a committee at the Home Ministry for further action

    "I had the chance to speak to some Rohingya UNHCR card holders (in the operation) yesterday

    "They also confessed that the agents managed trips to the UNHCR office in Kuala Lumpur for the process of obtaining the card

    "They (ethnic Rohingya) did not purchase the (UNHCR) cards, but they paid the agent between RM5,000 and RM7,000 per person, and the agent would take them to the UNHCR office

    Khairul Dzaimee said those arrested in the operation that started at 11.15pm consisted of 10 Bangladeshi men, eight Indonesian men, five Myanmar men and one Nepalese man and woman

  • 1MDB BONDS REPAYMENT MIGHT COST RM7.7B MORE, GUAN ENG SAYS AS RINGGIT WEAKENS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/17/1mdb-bonds-repayment-might-cost-rm77b-more-guan-eng-says-as-ringgit-weakens/28653

    09/17/2022

    53.85% Shortened!

    “The US$6.5 billion dollar bonds issued in 2012 (US$1.75 billion at 5.75 per cent per year and US$1.75 billion at 5.99 per cent per year) and 2013 (US$3 billion at 4.4 per cent per year), are due in 2022 and 2023 when the strength of the US dollar is at its highest in 24 years

    “At RM3.35 to the US dollar when the three 1MDB US$ bonds were issued, the principal amount of US$6.5 billion would come up to about RM21.8 billion

    “At the current exchange rate of RM4.54 to the US dollar, the principal amount due for the US$6.5 billion would be higher at RM29.5 billion ― or RM7.7 billion more,” he said

    The former finance minister said the cumulative interest would have snowballed to over RM1 billion a year and RM10.5 billion in the past decade

    “A weaker ringgit this year means that the annual interest cost is around RM1.5 billion instead of RM1 billion

    “In short, the weaker ringgit will cost the federal government and Malaysians to fork out RM7.7 billion ringgit more just to repay the principal of the US$ 6.5 billion 1MDB bonds,” he said.

    ['billion', 'bond', 'ringgit', 'year', 'dollar']

    “The US$6.5 billion dollar bonds issued in 2012 (US$1.75 billion at 5.75 per cent per year and US$1.75 billion at 5.99 per cent per year) and 2013 (US$3 billion at 4.4 per cent per year), are due in 2022 and 2023 when the strength of the US dollar is at its highest in 24 years

    “At RM3.35 to the US dollar when the three 1MDB US$ bonds were issued, the principal amount of US$6.5 billion would come up to about RM21.8 billion

    “At the current exchange rate of RM4.54 to the US dollar, the principal amount due for the US$6.5 billion would be higher at RM29.5 billion ― or RM7.7 billion more,” he said

    The former finance minister said the cumulative interest would have snowballed to over RM1 billion a year and RM10.5 billion in the past decade

    “A weaker ringgit this year means that the annual interest cost is around RM1.5 billion instead of RM1 billion

    “In short, the weaker ringgit will cost the federal government and Malaysians to fork out RM7.7 billion ringgit more just to repay the principal of the US$ 6.5 billion 1MDB bonds,” he said.

    ['billion', 'bond', 'ringgit', 'year', 'dollar']



  • FAREWELL, MY BELOVED MENTOR

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/17/farewell-my-beloved-mentor

    09/17/2022

    86.36% Shortened!

    Samy Vellu’s passing, they sent messages of compassion to me because they knew he meant a lot to me

    The following week at the Ipoh airport, an unemployed UK graduate in telecommunication approached Samy Vellu for a job in Telekom Malaysia

    Two weeks later, the graduate met Samy Vellu at the airport again and showed him the letter that his job application was unsuccessful

    I also observed another incident at the airport when a MIC member met Samy Vellu and told him that the bank would be confiscating his house soon

    Samy Vellu immediately went to the bank in Ipoh, signed a personal cheque, and paid off the loan for the man

    The only image framed and hung in my living room is the one with Samy Vellu and me

    Moreover, they look to reinforce the midfield in January (TMW)

    News – Liverpool could submit bid to finally sign £150,000 a week playmaker in January On the other hand, as per a story published by The Telegraph yesterday, Liverpool are leading to agree the signing of Jude Bellingham next summer

    Jurgen Klopp is a huge admirer of Bellingham and claimed that the only problem (last window) was that the player was not available

    The Telegraph claim since leaving Birmingham City for £20.7million, the teenage sensation’s market value has soared, he could be available next summer and sources suggest that Liverpool are expected to make their move

    It will be fair to say that the Reds must ensure CL qualification for next season to have any chance of signing Jude Bellingham next summer

  • HOW RONALDO'S MAN UNITED MOVE TURNED SOUR AS MESSI REVIVES PSG CAREER

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11218957/How-Cristiano-Ronaldos-Man-United-turned-sour-Lionel-Messi-continues-revive-PSG-career.html

    09/17/2022, 04:02

    86.96% Shortened!

    Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi have battled it out as two of the world's best players Ronaldo's emotional return to United - where he spent six years previously - started brilliantly Ronaldo continued his fine early form, as he scored eight times in his first 13 Premier League starts across the first half of the season

    Ronaldo's homecoming on the other hand began to turn increasingly sour in the new year

    To his credit, despite all the noise, Ronaldo ended United's worst season in Premier League history with 24 goals in all competitions, and was named in the PFA Team of the Year

    Perhaps demonstrating how sour Ronaldo's homecoming had turned, he indicated his desire to leave Old Trafford this summer for a Champions League club, as he was unwilling to play in the Europa League.  Ronaldo has been out of favour under Erik ten Hag, making just three starts this season His future dominated United's summer but a number of sides turned down the opportunity to sign the 37-year-old

    We’ll ask you to confirm this for your first post to Facebook

    Ronaldo's homecoming on the other hand began to turn increasingly sour in the new year

    09/17/2022

    68.42% Shortened!

    Janusz Michallik reacts to Bayern Munich's 1-0 loss to Augsburg in the Bundesliga

    The hosts were not intimidated by Bayern at any stage and their seven shots on goal were almost double Bayern's total in the opening half

    It was the first time in 87 matches that Bayern had failed to score in a league game and the first time in 20 years that the team had gone four league games without a win

    "After four games without a win we are stunned and ashamed," Bayern forward Thomas Muller said

    Gio Reyna speaks after Borussia Dortmund's 1-0 win over Schalke in the Bundesliga

    New legs will be essential in the coming months, and one player who could fit the bill next summer is Enzo Fernández

    Brazilian outlet UOL are already reporting that Liverpool are keen on Fernández, as well as Matheus Nunes, who has just signed for Wolves

    When Fernández is on the field, everybody knows

    If his club are willing to cash in next summer — as they were with Núñez — he could be a great fit for Klopp and once paired with Thiago or even Bellingham, he could help transform Liverpool's ageing midfield.

  • WHAT HAS HAPPENED TO SON HEUNG-MIN? TOTTENHAM'S OUT-OF-FORM STAR HAS GONE EIGHT GAMES WITHOUT A GOAL

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11211101/What-happened-Son-Heung-min-Tottenhams-form-star-gone-EIGHT-games-without-goal.html

    09/17/2022

    82.86% Shortened!

    Son won the Premier League's Golden Boot last season with 23 goals, including a flurry of 12 in the last 10 games of the season to pull level with Liverpool's Mo Salah at the top of the charts

    In the last six campaigns, Son has never failed to score double figures in the Premier League, with 89 goals during this period

    Before this season, he had averaged a goal every 173.9 minutes since moving to England

    Tottenham forward Son Heung-min has failed to score a single goal in the first eight games Son won the Premier League Golden Boot last season with 23 goals to share the prize with Mohamed Salah Fast forward to today and the South Korean international has started in all eight of Spurs' matches so far this season, but is yet to find the back of the net, which is beginning to get worrying given his prolific form ever since arriving in north London

    Son played 520 minutes in his first six matches last term as opposed to his 493 minutes this season

    The forward has the same amount of assists in that time and has actually had more shots, 15 this season compared to 10 last season

    ['season', 'son', 'last', 'goal', 'game']

  • MANCHESTER UNITED’S PLAN FOR NEXT THREE SIGNINGS IS DAMNING ON OLE GUNNAR SOLSKJAER

    https://www.express.co.uk/sport/football/1670618/Manchester-United-transfer-news-Ole-Gunnar-Solskjaer-Erik-ten-Hag-damning

    More info Manchester United are, according to reports, looking to sign a right-back, central midfielder and striker as part of the next phase of Erik ten Hag’s rebuild

    And it’s now damning that, just a year after his departure, United are now planing on doing the same with Ten Hag

    United chief John Murtough told Ten Hag to give Wan-Bissaka a chance back in the summer, with the club reluctant to take a loss on the right-back

    Even under Ten Hag, who he previously played under at Ajax, the 25-year-old has been marginalised - though injuries have admittedly played a role as well

    “EVGA is committed to our customers and will continue to offer sales and support on the current lineup

    Also, EVGA would like to say thank you to our great community for the many years of support and enthusiasm for EVGA graphics cards.” Again, another primary takeaway is that EVGA confirmed that it will not be carrying the next generation of NVIDIA GPUs and will only support current generation products and that it will “continue to provide the current generation products,” at least until its stocks run dry

    And that is to say nothing of the GPU brand’s talks of price ceiling and restrictions to the type of changes EVGA can make to the GPU, including options like adding more memory

  • SINGAPORE, MALAYSIA AND THAILAND - THUNDERY WET WEATHER EXPECTED TO PERSIST FOR NEXT TWO WEEKS, SAYS WEATHERMAN

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2022/09/16/singapore-malaysia-and-thailand---thundery-wet-weather-expected-to-persist-for-next-two-weeks-says-weatherman

    09/16/2022, 22:03

    68.18% Shortened!

    Friday, 16 Sep 2022

    As with the first half of September, the prevailing south-west monsoon conditions are predicted to persist over Singapore and the surrounding region

    Low-level winds are expected to continue blowing from the south-east or south-west, said the Meteorological Service Singapore (MSS) on Friday

    A Sumatra squall is an organised line of thunderstorms that originate from Sumatra island and typically move towards Singapore and the surrounding region which includes Thailand and Malaysia

    Overall, rain is expected to be heavier in the second half of September compared to the first half, MSS said

    The southwest monsoon over the Andaman Sea, Thailand and the Gulf of Thailand will also strengthen during the period

    The department also said waves in upper Andaman and upper Gulf will be 1 to 2 metres high and higher during thundershowers

    ['thailand', 'singapore', 'half', 'region', 'say']

    Friday, 16 Sep 2022

    As with the first half of September, the prevailing south-west monsoon conditions are predicted to persist over Singapore and the surrounding region

    Low-level winds are expected to continue blowing from the south-east or south-west, said the Meteorological Service Singapore (MSS) on Friday

    A Sumatra squall is an organised line of thunderstorms that originate from Sumatra island and typically move towards Singapore and the surrounding region which includes Thailand and Malaysia

    Overall, rain is expected to be heavier in the second half of September compared to the first half, MSS said

    The southwest monsoon over the Andaman Sea, Thailand and the Gulf of Thailand will also strengthen during the period

    The department also said waves in upper Andaman and upper Gulf will be 1 to 2 metres high and higher during thundershowers

  • SAMY VELLU CREMATED FOLLOWING SEND-OFF BY HUNDREDS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/16/samy-vellu-cremated-following-send-off-by-hundreds/28584

    09/16/2022, 20:04

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 16 — At 5.40pm today, black smoke emerged from the chimney of Kuala Lumpur City Hall (DBKL) crematorium in Cheras to signify the cremation of former MIC president Tun S

    Besides Vell Paari, MIC leaders including the current president Tan Sri S A Vigneswaran and deputy Datuk Seri M

    Saravanan stayed throughout the cremation

    Samy Vellu was the seventh MIC president and also the ethnic Indian party’s longest-serving, holding the position for 31 years

    He served as works minister from June 1983 to June 1989, and held that post again from May 1995 to March 2008

    He also held the ministerial portfolios for energy and telecommunications from June 1989 to May 1995, as well as works and public amenities from September 1979 to June 1983.

    ['mic', 'president', 'minister', 'also', 'year']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 16 — At 5.40pm today, black smoke emerged from the chimney of Kuala Lumpur City Hall (DBKL) crematorium in Cheras to signify the cremation of former MIC president Tun S

    Besides Vell Paari, MIC leaders including the current president Tan Sri S A Vigneswaran and deputy Datuk Seri M

    Saravanan stayed throughout the cremation

    Samy Vellu was the seventh MIC president and also the ethnic Indian party’s longest-serving, holding the position for 31 years

    He served as works minister from June 1983 to June 1989, and held that post again from May 1995 to March 2008

    He also held the ministerial portfolios for energy and telecommunications from June 1989 to May 1995, as well as works and public amenities from September 1979 to June 1983.

    ['mic', 'president', 'minister', 'also', 'year']



  • PETRONAS OFFICIALLY LAUNCHES GENTARI – EV LEASING VIA VAAS, 25,000 EV CHARGING POINTS IN ASIA-PAC BY 2030 - PAULTAN.ORG

    https://paultan.org/2022/09/16/petronas-officially-launches-gentari-ev-leasing-via-vaas-25000-ev-charging-points-in-asia-pac-by-2030/

    09/16/2022, 20:03

    70.0% Shortened!

    The company aims to become a one-stop provider of clean energy solutions, beginning with a suite of renewable energy, hydrogen and green mobility solutions for commercial, industrial, and retail customers

    To date, it already has 1.1 gigawatt peak of renewable energy capacity in operations and under development globally

    On the electric vehicle (EV) charging infrastructure front, it is looking to capture a 10% market share

    Presently, it has already installed more than 190 charging points, and delivered a mix of over 250 electric two-wheelers and three-wheelers as part of its green mobility fleet in India and Malaysia

    In late June, it was revealed that it had begun developing it two-wheeler fleet solution business in Malaysia, working with Eclimo Motors

    The only GREEN ENERGY is HYDROGEN FUEL CELL vehicle

    ['malaysia', 'energy', 'petronas', 'hydrogen', 'charge']

    The company aims to become a one-stop provider of clean energy solutions, beginning with a suite of renewable energy, hydrogen and green mobility solutions for commercial, industrial, and retail customers

    To date, it already has 1.1 gigawatt peak of renewable energy capacity in operations and under development globally

    On the electric vehicle (EV) charging infrastructure front, it is looking to capture a 10% market share

    Presently, it has already installed more than 190 charging points, and delivered a mix of over 250 electric two-wheelers and three-wheelers as part of its green mobility fleet in India and Malaysia

    In late June, it was revealed that it had begun developing it two-wheeler fleet solution business in Malaysia, working with Eclimo Motors

    The only GREEN ENERGY is HYDROGEN FUEL CELL vehicle

    ['malaysia', 'energy', 'petronas', 'hydrogen', 'charge']



  • WHO WILL ATTEND QUEEN ELIZABETH’S FUNERAL?

    https://www.thenews.com.pk/latest/991797-who-will-attend-queen-elizabeths-funeral

    09/16/2022, 16:02

    76.0% Shortened!

    - Global leaders - US President Joe Biden and his wife Jill Biden head the diplomatic guest list, after the White House confirmed they would come to the funeral

    French President Emmanuel Macron will also attend, the Elysee said, to show the "unbreakable" bond with Britain and pay respects to the "eternal queen"

    In a symbolic move to pay tribute to the queen whose 2011 state visit helped heal decades of tensions, Ireland´s Taoiseach, prime minister Micheal Martin, will also attend

    Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese and New Zealand Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern, whose nations have the British sovereign as their head of state, are all set to come

    From the Commonwealth of mainly former British colonies will come leaders including South African President Cyril Ramaphosa, Bangladesh´s Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina, Sri Lankan President Ranil Wickremesinghe and Fijian Prime Minister Frank Bainimarama

    Military-run Myanmar, a former British colony, and long-time pariah North Korea have also been snubbed, the British source said on condition of anonymity

    ['leader', 'attend', 'state', 'funeral', 'queen']

    - Global leaders - US President Joe Biden and his wife Jill Biden head the diplomatic guest list, after the White House confirmed they would come to the funeral

    French President Emmanuel Macron will also attend, the Elysee said, to show the "unbreakable" bond with Britain and pay respects to the "eternal queen"

    In a symbolic move to pay tribute to the queen whose 2011 state visit helped heal decades of tensions, Ireland´s Taoiseach, prime minister Micheal Martin, will also attend

    Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese and New Zealand Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern, whose nations have the British sovereign as their head of state, are all set to come

    From the Commonwealth of mainly former British colonies will come leaders including South African President Cyril Ramaphosa, Bangladesh´s Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina, Sri Lankan President Ranil Wickremesinghe and Fijian Prime Minister Frank Bainimarama

    Military-run Myanmar, a former British colony, and long-time pariah North Korea have also been snubbed, the British source said on condition of anonymity

  • TIME TO REOPEN BORDERS AND RETURN TO NORMALCY, ISMAIL SABRI URGES CHINA

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/16/time-to-reopen-borders-and-return-to-normalcy-ismail-sabri-urges-china

    09/16/2022, 15:04

    57.14% Shortened!

    Friday, 16 Sep 2022

    Malaysian Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob said this was important, not just to stimulate economic activities, but to also create an environment that could enhance the strategic partnership of Asean and China

    Ismail Sabri was addressing at the opening of the 19th China-Asean Expo (Caexpo) in Nanning city of China’s southern Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region on Friday (Sept 16)

    "In this regard, I highly hope that China can join its Asean friends in taking steps to re-open up its borders in the near future," he added

    Malaysia has been chosen as the Country of Honour at the expo, which is held from Sept 16 to 19

    The number of Malaysian exhibitors has dropped from more than 170 before Covid-19, to 58 in 2020 and 2021 due to the strict pandemic control and prevention policy imposed in China

    ['malaysia', 'china', 'open', 'ismail', 'sabri']

    “So there is an incorrect confusion that Sabah and Sarawak joined Malaysia,” he said in a Facebook post

    “Sabah and Sarawak did not join Malaysia

    Instead, Sabah and Sarawak came together with the Federation of Malaya to form Malaysia

    Zahid also pointed out that Sabah’s foreign direct investments are projected to exceed RM7 billion — which would make the state the third largest recipient of foreign investments in Malaysia — indicating Sabah and Sarawak’s great development potential

    Currently, talks are going on that Sabah and Sarawak should get 35 per cent of the seats in Malaysia’s Parliament

    On September 9, Minister in the Prime Minister’s Department (Sabah and Sarawak Affairs) Datuk Seri Maximus Ongkili announced that a meeting of the Special Council on the Malaysia Agreement, chaired by Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri, had endorsed the proposed seat increase

    The PTPTN also thanked the Prime Minister for the announcement

    Meanwhile, the PTPTN said borrowers who have completed their studies from 2019 by obtaining a First Class Bachelor’s Degree are eligible to apply for a loan repayment exemption from yesterday until Dec 31

    A long exposure photograph showing members of the public as they file past the coffin of Queen Elizabeth II, draped in the Royal Standard with the Imperial State Crown and the Sovereign's orb and sceptre, lying in state on the catafalque in Westminster Hall, at the Palace of Westminster, London, ahead of her funeral on Monday

    It was a special few hours." New Zealand Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern, in London for the funeral, was another of those who visited Westminster Hall on Friday, stopping to curtsy as she filed past the coffin

    Soldiers in ceremonial uniform and other officials are keeping vigil around it as people walk past to pay homage after their long wait

    Some 750,000 people in total are expected to file past the coffin ahead of the state funeral on Monday which presidents, prime ministers, royalty and other world leaders are due to attend

    In an adjustment to protocol, both Harry and his uncle Prince Andrew have been allowed to wear military uniform when they take their turns, royal officials said

    Some 750,000 people in total are expected to file past the coffin ahead of the state funeral on Monday which presidents, prime ministers, royalty and other world leaders are due to attend

    In an adjustment to protocol, both Harry and his uncle Prince Andrew have been allowed to wear military uniform when they take their turns, royal officials said

    On Saturday evening, Queen Elizabeth's eight grandchildren, including Princes William and Harry, will also stand vigil beside her coffin, a royal spokesman said

    The coffin will lie in state at Westminster Hall in London until the state funeral on Monday to allow members of the public to pay their respects to the late monarch

    Officials expect about 750,000 people to view the coffin before the lying-in-state ends at 6.30 a.m

    (0530 GMT) on Monday

    In an adjustment to protocol, both Prince Harry and his uncle Prince Andrew will be allowed to wear military uniform when they take their turns standing vigil at the queen's coffin

  • LIVERPOOL PLAN FOR ARTHUR MELO IS CLEAR DESPITE JUDE BELLINGHAM LINKS AND THIAGO ALCANTARA RETURN

    https://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/liverpool-arthur-bellingham-thiago-plan-25029202

    09/16/2022, 10:05

    82.05% Shortened!

    Arthur Melo has already been linked with a premature return to Juventus after joining Liverpool on loan on transfer deadline day Follow the latest transfer news and more with our LFC newsletter We have more newsletters Arthur Melo’s Liverpool career is just two weeks’ old

    Admittedly Thiago’s impressive return from injury against Ajax, Henderson’s expected return after the September injury break and the prospect of Keita and Oxlade-Chamberlain, if not Jones as well, returning next month could ensure Arthur’s opportunities remain limited

    Now it remains to be seen what Liverpool’s long-term plan for the Juventus loanee exactly is, despite their option to buy him next summer

    It is plausible a move could be made for a target in January as a result, but it would be premature to suggest any such move would be at the expense of Arthur

    And even if he ends up just being the latter, the fact that Liverpool would have known the return dates and injury records of their walking wounded when bringing him suggests his purpose at Anfield, with Thiago now back, has not already been fulfilled

    With time on the training pitch and recovery time limited too, injuries will follow and Klopp will need everybody available to him

    Given persistent links with Jude Bellingham, only time will tell if Arthur is still a Liverpool player in 12 months’ time

  • NEW CAR SALES LIKELY TO SOFTEN NEXT YEAR

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2022/09/16/new-car-sales-likely---------to-soften-next-year

    09/16/2022, 10:02

    76.92% Shortened!

    This would mark a reversal from the automotive industry’s strong turnover this year

    In a note yesterday, RHB Research analyst Jim Lim Khai Xhiang said automotive executives are upbeat about the performance for the second half of 2022 (2H22), but are cautious on the outlook for 2023

    Despite his neutral view on the automotive sector, Lim said he favours Bermaz Auto Bhd (BAuto) and Sime Darby Bhd

    “We still favour BAuto for its 7% dividend yield for the financial year of 2023 and growth in its Kia and Peugeot brands, and Sime Darby for its about 5% yield and resilience in its industrial segment and high-end motor brands,” he said

    RHB Research has raised the automotive sector’s one-year forward earnings by 5%, mainly lifted by the 27% increase for UMW Holdings Bhd

    “We also lifted two-year forward earnings (FY+2) by 2%, as our higher Perodua sales assumption (fuelled by the popularity of the all-new Alza) boosted UMW’s and MBM’s earnings forecasts

    ['new', 'car', 'sale', 'automotive', 'lim']

    This would mark a reversal from the automotive industry’s strong turnover this year

    In a note yesterday, RHB Research analyst Jim Lim Khai Xhiang said automotive executives are upbeat about the performance for the second half of 2022 (2H22), but are cautious on the outlook for 2023

    Despite his neutral view on the automotive sector, Lim said he favours Bermaz Auto Bhd (BAuto) and Sime Darby Bhd

    “We still favour BAuto for its 7% dividend yield for the financial year of 2023 and growth in its Kia and Peugeot brands, and Sime Darby for its about 5% yield and resilience in its industrial segment and high-end motor brands,” he said

    RHB Research has raised the automotive sector’s one-year forward earnings by 5%, mainly lifted by the 27% increase for UMW Holdings Bhd

    “We also lifted two-year forward earnings (FY+2) by 2%, as our higher Perodua sales assumption (fuelled by the popularity of the all-new Alza) boosted UMW’s and MBM’s earnings forecasts

    ['new', 'car', 'sale', 'automotive', 'lim']



  • NUR JAZLAN CLAIMS CERTAIN UMNO LEADERS PLANNING TO FORM ‘TRANS-BORNEO’ POLITICAL PACT AFTER GE15

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/16/nur-jazlan-claims-certain-umno-leaders-planning-to-form-trans-borneo-political-pact-after-ge15/28524

    09/16/2022

    70.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise JOHOR BARU, Sept 16 — Outspoken Johor Umno leader Datuk Nur Jazlan Mohamed today claimed that there are several dissident Umno leaders involved in a covert effort to form a ‘Trans-Borneo’ political pact to take over the country after the 15th general election (GE15)

    Nur Jazlan did not name the Umno leaders involved in the plot, but they are believed to be against party president Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi

    However, Nur Jazlan said that GPS had disagreed and rejected the proposed plan by the dissident Umno leaders and their PN partners

    Nur Jazlan Sarawakians do not need the ‘Trans PN-BN-Borneo’ political pact to improve their lives

    Nur Jazlan, who is also the Pulai Umno division chief, pointed out that the dissident faction is prepared to betray their own party’s struggle to continue their position and privileges in Putrajaya

    “They know that a majority of Umno leaders and the party’s grassroots are opposed to any political cooperation with both Bersatu and PAS, who are the main parties in PN,” said Nur Jazlan

    ['umno', 'leader', 'nur', 'jazlan', 'political']

  • HOW LONG WILL NAJIB’S DISQUALIFICATION AS AN MP BE STAYED? — HAFIZ HASSAN

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/what-you-think/2022/09/16/how-long-will-najibs-disqualification-as-an-mp-be-stayed-hafiz-hassan/28473

    09/16/2022, 08:05

    57.14% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise SEPTEMBER 16 — Expectedly, former prime minister Najib Razak filed his petition for a pardon within 14 days of his conviction and sentence

    In simple words, the disqualification as an MP will be “stayed” if within 14 days of the sentence the convicted MP files a petition for a pardon

    The stay extends until the disposal of his petition for a pardon

    (See Joshua Wu Kai-Ming, “Why the Pasir Gudang MP is wrong about Najib’s disqualification”) That’s the reason for the “almost immediate” filing of the petition for a pardon

    Anwar’s petition was considered, deliberated and disposed of within three weeks of filing

    In other words, his disqualification as an MP was stayed for only three weeks after the filing of his petition

    ['file', 'petition', 'pardon', 'within', 'day']

    About Us Advertise SEPTEMBER 16 — Expectedly, former prime minister Najib Razak filed his petition for a pardon within 14 days of his conviction and sentence

    In simple words, the disqualification as an MP will be “stayed” if within 14 days of the sentence the convicted MP files a petition for a pardon

    The stay extends until the disposal of his petition for a pardon

    (See Joshua Wu Kai-Ming, “Why the Pasir Gudang MP is wrong about Najib’s disqualification”) That’s the reason for the “almost immediate” filing of the petition for a pardon

    Anwar’s petition was considered, deliberated and disposed of within three weeks of filing

    In other words, his disqualification as an MP was stayed for only three weeks after the filing of his petition

    ['file', 'petition', 'pardon', 'within', 'day']



  • 'ONLY THREE-DAY STORM WARNING'

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/16/only-three-day-storm-warning

    09/16/2022, 08:05

    76.0% Shortened!

    “The only thing we know is that there will be four to six monsoon surges (that cause continuous rain), which will happen between November this year and March next year, and we can provide an alert as early as three days or at least a day before the event

    He was commenting on several media reports which said that there would be a major flood at the end of November this year

    He said Malaysia would experience the same amount of rain as last year

    “However, the amount of rainfall alone does not mean that the country will experience a similar magnitude of floods compared to what happened last year

    Nadma deputy director Datuk Khairul Shahril Idrus, who also attended the programme, said Malaysia was expected to experience the north-east monsoon season from November this year until March next year

    Kelantan, Terengganu and Pahang are expected to be hit by heavy rains in November and December this year, while Johor, Sabah and Sarawak are expected to have heavy rainfall from December until January next year

    ['flood', 'say', 'rainfall', 'november', 'year']

  • IN LATEST REPORT, DEMOCRACY WATCHDOG LISTS WAYS CHINA IS SHAPING CONVERSATION IN MALAYSIA

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/16/in-latest-report-democracy-watchdog-lists-ways-china-is-shaping-conversation-in-malaysia/28262

    09/16/2022, 08:04

    76.0% Shortened!

    According to the report, a score of zero denotes “least influence”, while a score of 85 denotes “most influence”

    The report also said that there was “a culture of self-censorship among both Malay- and Chinese-language journalists”, who were cautious about critiquing China as they may face retaliation or harm Malaysia’s bilateral ties with China

    [to] maintain bilateral relations with the People’s Republic of China’,” read the report

    Malaysian Chinese-language media Furthermore, Freedom House also noted Malaysia’s numerous Chinese-language media that serve the country’s ethnic Chinese community and Chinese diaspora living here

    The report also noted concerns about how “distorted content, including outright disinformation” from Chinese state media and other pro-Chinese Communist Party outlets, reached Chinese-language media in Malaysia, especially during the 2019 to 2020 Hong Kong protests

    However, the report acknowledged that “there was no evidence during the coverage period of political censorship or content manipulation on Chinese apps or devices using Chinese technology in Malaysia”

    ['china', 'medium', 'malaysia', 'report', 'say']
